Dumbdown - The dumb alternative to markdown

The dialect of Dumbdown included in the JTree project is used as a demonstration and to autogenerate readmes from Grammars.

Dumbdown spawned an official project: Scroll

Can you show me some example code?

title This is Dumbdown. The keyword for title is title. title2 Dumbdown compiles to html. paragraph Dumbdown is an alternative to Markdown. link https://treenotation.org/ It is built on Tree Notation code alert(`The keyword for code blocks is "code"`) list item Dumbdown supports lists item For now the keyword for an item is "item" item This is a very early version item Dumbdown is released to the public domain item If you want to make it better, please do!
